title: Thick fog triggers red alerts across UAE, motorists urged to take caution
summary_full: Dense fog enveloped parts of the UAE on Tuesday morning. This caused significant disruptions to daily commutes. Weather and transport authorities issued urgent warnings due to sharply reduced visibility. Speed limits were lowered on several roads. Temperatures remained mild across the country. Residents were advised to stay alert and follow official updates.
